definition: to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch
to provide relief during times of emergency and disaster (idiom)

sentences.english: Worker dies at Japan's tsunami-hit nuclear plant.
sentences.chinese: 日本参加核电站泄漏抢险的一名工人死亡。

sentences.english: People's policemen shall take an active part in rescue and relief work as well as in social welfare services.
sentences.chinese: 人民警察应当积极参加抢险救灾和社会公益工作。

sentences.english: Some 287,000 soldiers have been called into flood-prevention work.
sentences.chinese: 28万7千名武警战士已经投入到防洪抢险的最前线。

sentences.english: I'm extending my hearty greetings and highest respect to all the rescuers.
sentences.chinese: 谨向全体抢险人员表示亲切慰问和崇高敬意。

sentences.english: Their primary task facing was in the southwest of rescue and relief.
sentences.chinese: 他们首要面临的任务便是西南地区的抢险救灾。

sentences.english: Almost every year, there are floods or waterlog in our country, and the PLA often fights the disasters.
sentences.chinese: 我国是个洪涝灾害多发国家，军队参加抗洪抢险频繁。

sentences.english: Conclusion It could provide scientific base for policy making of appropriate emergency rescue.
sentences.chinese: 结论为及时有效组织救援抢险提供了一种科学方法。

sentences.english: Rescue teams on top of the Tangjiashan quake lake dam are using solar power to illuminate the site.
sentences.chinese: 唐家山堰塞湖坝顶抢险部队用太阳能照明。

sentences.english: 4 today is still covered by the concrete cover called the 'sarcophagus' which was hastily improvised to stem the outflow of radiation.
sentences.chinese: 石棺是在抢险时仓促建成，用以遏制辐射外泄。

sentences.english: One emergency war against floods was kicked off again.
sentences.chinese: 一场紧张的抗洪抢险应急战再次打开。

sentences.english: To strengthen the state capacity for emergency rescue and relief work.
sentences.chinese: 灾害应急抢险救援能力建设。

sentences.english: Guo Gengmao, the provincial governor has gone to the mine to take charge of the rescue operation.
sentences.chinese: 河南省省长郭庚茂已赶赴现场指挥抢险救援。

sentences.english: Non-engineering measures for flood control are inadaptable to emergency requirements against flooding.
sentences.chinese: 防洪非工程措施不适应防汛抢险要求。

sentences.english: Modified screw anchors are suitable to the closure work.
sentences.chinese: 经改进的螺旋锚适用于堵口抢险工程。

definition: to provide relief during times of emergency and disaster (idiom)
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
to repair in a rush/rush repairs
to rush through urgently (e.g. emergency supplies)
water levels during the flood season
